oai_dc:dc.dc:title: LABORATORY EXPERIMENTS ON GENERATION OF LONG WAVES IN THE SURF ZONE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Okayasu, Akio
Matsumoto, Teruki
Suzuki, Yasuyuki
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: laboratory experiment
wave generation
long waves
surf zone
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Laboratory experiments were performed to investigate generation of long waves in the surf zone. Amplitude of long waves generated by timevarying breaking points was found to be nearly same as that of incoming bounded long wave. The generated long waves showed phase difference with the incoming long waves. The difference of the phases reached to 3/4 7r through 7r at the shoreline.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 25 (1996): Proceedings of 25th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Orlando, Florida, 1996.
